Description:
512m2 Titled Block In Prime Location With 16m Frontage
The vendor says sell, all offers will be presented
Perfectly rectangular titled land in a premium family friendly location.
Titled & ready to build your dream home with 16 meter frontage, 32 meter length.
Front 16m
Depth 32m
Total Area 512 m2
* Less than 5 minutes to Train Station
* Public Transport Short Drive away
* Easy access onto the Freeway & Local Schools
* Minutes away from the Upcoming Business Center & all the amenities
An opportunity that will not wait, Nestled in the heart of Melbournes regional north, Cloverton (Stockland) Estate is less than 50 kilometers to Melbournes CBD and less than 10 minutes drive to Craigieburn.

Description:
8 Months Young Vibrant Home Located in a Phenomenal Area
The ELEET Wyndham City & Sahil Kakar- Proudly Presents this modern, meticulously built 20.3 Sq spacious home which will sway you at the outset, with its elegant design, its aesthetic appeal and its sheer virtuosity in space usage. It is situated in a popular up coming suburb of Kalkallo located in close proximity to the Hume Highway.
Exquisitely maintained, it's been a home to caring owners, thereby providing an excellent opportunity for a first home buyer or for an investor to reap the benefits of a rewarding investment.
A fully functional impressive floor plan consisting of a well appointed kitchen with quality appliances, 3 spacious bedrooms featuring master with en-suite & walk in robe & 2 good size bedrooms with built In robes. Living zone consist of a formal lounge connected to a full blooming backyard and separate meals area.
This is the one stop shop whether to nest or invest!
More spectacular features that sets this home apart:
** Evaporative cooling & Ducted Heating
** Main Bedroom en-suite with double vanity
** 5.5 Kw Solar Panels
** Down lights all through the home
** Feature Lights to add beauty and ambiance to the kitchen, dinning and lounge space
** 40MM Stone Waterfall Island & stone bench tops all through the house
** 900MM stainless steel appliances cook top, range hood, quality oven from WestingHouse &
Bosch dishwasher
** Auto Double garage with inside and rear access
** L shaped kitchen with tiles splash back
** Kitchen & TV Bulkheads
** Extra Lounge/ Study room at the front
Call Sahil on 0401 926 466 to arrange a private inspection as this one won't last long.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Photo ID is a must for all inspections.
With the Current Situation of COVID19 we are requesting all interested parties to view the virtual tool and book for inspection only if you are seriously considering buying this home. To eliminate any issues we are following govt protocol to practice hygienic and safe environment for health and well being.
Any recent overseas travellers are requested to stay in isolation and same is expected with anyone having any flu related symptoms. Please give us a call and we can assist you with the virtual options. Thank you
Internal area
190m²

Description:
Titled, ready to build your picture perfect home
Phone enquiry code for this property: 1720
A fabulous opportunity to start your new life in the vibrant Cloverton Estate.
Offered for sale is this vacant, flat and level block comprising of 448m2 (approx.) with a wide 16m frontage, which is titled and ready to start building immediately.
This block is suitable for an array of home designs and provides the perfect opportunity for you to build your family home now.
Minutes away from Hume freeway, Donnybrook train station and easy access to all amenities. Cloverton will become a centre of education north of Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all proposed for the area. A major retail centre is being planned, while public transport and medical services will provide everything the community needs.
Phone enquiry code for this property: 1720

Description:
Contemporary family-friendly living does not get any better than this!
Capital & Co Real Estate, Proudly Present.
Inspection By Appointment
Spread across a generous 648sqm allotment, this quality built Carlisle Home will win your heart the moment you walk in.
With its impressive entranceway, you will be greeted with a spacious master suite with fitted walk in robe and fully appointed ensuite with double vanity and separate toilet.
The gourmet kitchen features an oversized island bench, butler's pantry, 900mm appliances, large double sink, 40mm stone benchtops, and an abundance of storage.
This magnificent home boasts a large open plan living/dining area overlooking a tiled alfresco and manicured low maintenance garden.
The home also has a formal lounge and separate rumpus or 5th bedroom.
There is three more generously proportioned bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom, and laundry.
Extra Features:
Dishwasher
Reverse Cycle Zoned Heating/Cooling
Double Glazed windows and Doors
Remote Control Roller Blinds In all living areas
2.5 garage with rear access
Crimsafe Security Doors
Large Garden
Close to Parks & playgrounds, quality sports facilities, schools, Transport, as well as retail/cafe precincts highlight the scope of Cloverton's impressive master plan, along with easy access to Donnybrook Train Station & the Hume Freeway.
Be quick to book your inspection & secure this magnificent beauty.
Internal area
306m²

Description:
Character And Charm With Modern Style
Here is your opportunity to secure an outstanding home with land size of 448 sqm in the highly popular Cloverton Estate.
This Elegant Living Homes masterpiece has four bedrooms, alfresco, multiple living areas and family friendly floor plan. From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Features include:
- Large Master bedroom with WIR and personal ensuite
- Three more generous bedrooms both with BIR's
- Luxurious open plan living area including kitchen, meals and dining area
- High Ceilings
- Upgraded Façade
- Superior laminate flooring in bedrooms
- Porcelain tiles (wet areas& living area)
- Refigrated cooling
- Downlights throughout
- Luxury washbasins & designer tap ware
- Grand island stone bench top in kitchen with waterfall
- Caesar stone benchtops to ensuite & common bath
- Glass splashback to kitchen
- Modern look garage door with remote controller
- Colour-concrete driveway & Fencing
- Gorgeous front landscaping
- Striking outdoor Kitchen - perfect to kick back with a glass of wine and entertain guests
- Double remote garage with internal access to the home
Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long

Description:
Elegance and Inviting Ambience
It is our pleasure to present this luxury home, featuring 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 car garage, and much more of outstanding designer features.
With a modern welcoming exterior facade, and an easy to maintain landscaped garden, settled in Cloverton Estate this exceptional family home is thoughtfully under construction with every need in mind.
From the stylish entry that feels you with a sense of generous space, you will walk into the opulent master suite with a walk-in robe area and a lavish en-suite.
Displaying a sophisticated and elegantly designed kitchen ideal for entertaining, featured with 900mm S/S appliances and a island bench top,the Open plan living and dining room for everyone to enjoy is bright with plenty of natural daylight.
The three spacious bedrooms all of which feature built-in-robes,a bathroom conveniently serves the remaining three bedrooms, built with stone benches, floor to ceiling wall tiles.
There are so many reasons to make this house your dream home, and the following just adds to the luxury features offered - Cooling and ducted heating, downlights throughout the home, 2.7 height ceilings throughout, blinds and much more…

Description:
SOLD BY ARVIN SINGH 0402 713 612 & ROCKY SIDHU 0433 244 099
Fully titled and ready to build your dream hom this beautiful block is situated in one of the wonderful streets in the Cloverton Estate providing outstanding scope to create the ultimate indoor/outdoor family lifestyle experience.
In a Cloverton neighbourhood that will be dominated by green open spaces, the block itself is approximately 512m2 - more than double the size of many in the vicinity - providing
the depth & width to accommodate the grandest of homes. Building in Cloverton, you'll also reap the rewards of the area's Green Star development principles ensuring every property adheres to a 6-star energy standard - saving on your fuel bills, minimizing your environmental footprint & creating a healthier environment for everyone in the community.
Adding to its appeal, this premier location will offer immediate access to the best of Cloverton's masterplan amenities including expansive parklands & Merri Creek conservation area, a range of sports facilities, retail & dining precincts, as well as future primary & secondary schools & proposed train station. An outstanding opportunity in the north's thriving growth corridor, it also provides immediate access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway.
Call Rocky Sidhu 0433 244 099 for private inspection.

Description:
WOW FACTOR!!!
Harcourts Roxburgh park , proudly presents this newly built double storey family entertainer, located in Kalkallo in the north's vibrant heartland, enjoy access to the best of what Craigieburn & Epping has to offer, with the Hume HWY and Donnybrook Train Station right next door.
Recently built this designer masterpiece comes with all the inclusion you could wish for and a perfect floor plan to meet any family's need.
Downstairs
# Open plan Master-Chef kitchen with stone bench top, stainless steel cooking appliances, ample storage Pantry.
# Living & Dining area overlooking kitchen
#guest room
# Central bathroom
#Seperate laundry with storage
# Double look up garage
# Step outside to the alfresco perfect for all year round entertaining.
Upstairs
# Master Bedroom with WIR and full En-suite and balcony
# Three Good size Bedrooms with BIR
# Central Bathroom
# Family retreat
Extra Features - Refrigerating Heating and Cooling, intercom, high ceilings, floating floor boards , dishwasher and much more...
Be quick to book your inspection & secure this magnificent beauty.
Call Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542 to book your inspection today. Photo ID required for all Inspections.
light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Large Family Living
Set in the beautiful Cloverton estate, amongst quality homes and treelined streets sits this Stunning Large home ideal for a growing family. Proudly built by Burbank and with quality in mind this Large Family home uses a clever floor plan to provided flexible living without compromising on space or comfort. Comprising of Large master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, 4 Additional bedrooms all with built in robe and mirror glass doors, Large Kitchen with stone bench tops and 900mm Stainless steel appliances as well as Adjoining meals and family room to highlight a few.
Additional features including Formal lounge, retreat/optional study, main bathroom including bathtub, Oversized garage with room enough for 2 cars plus storage as well as drive through access, Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system and security cameras, Garden shed, front and back low maintenance gardens and much much more. All this located on a 560m parcel of land (approximately)
Cloverton is a landmark community in Melbourne's north that will revolutionise residential living in Victoria. Imagine life in a clever and progressive city with jobs, schools, transport and entertainment right on your doorstep and more than 80 hectares of conservation space for a healthy outdoor lifestyle. To Truly appreciate this home, an inspection is a must, Please Call To Arrange Now.

Description:
SOLD BY KALLEY SINGH 0433 927 573 & VIJETH SHETTY 0402 407 840 FOR $652,000
TOP NOTCH INCLUSION LIST, IN THE PREMIUM POCKET OF KALKALLO and You could be the lucky owner of this rare designer, luxury house!
32Sq house spread across the land size of 512Sqm with a 3metre ceiling throughout is a rare and rewarding opportunity.
Nestled in a Central Location, this single level family home is sure to make a lasting impression. An attractive facade, flowing floor plan, fabulous entertaining zones and impeccable surrounds illustrate the allure of this tastefully enhanced home delivering a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with picture perfect views onto the famous greens of the Cloverton Estate.
The heart of the home is the open plan kitchen, meals and family room that is filled with loads of natural light and overlooks the extensive tiled alfresco area which seamlessly flows into the decent size low maintenance backyard.
The luxurious master bedroom enjoys a walk-in robe and en suite with oversize shower, while three additional bedrooms, a sleek family bathroom, theater area, kids retreat area, bright practical laundry and remarkable size living area with kitchenette perfect for in-law accommodation complete the floor plan. The spacious kitchen which comprises of waterfall stone bench tops and provides modern functionality with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and butler's walk-in pantry connecting to an outstanding dining/living zone overlooking a well-manicured backyard. Journey outside to a magnificent outdoor area surrounded by an exceptional size backyard providing the ultimate lifestyle to entertain family and friends.
Add the convenience of a double remote garage with internal access,refrigerated cooling & heating, plus external lighting and security system for added peace of mind and long list of desired extras. Everything you could ever want in your dream family home is right here.
Close to Parks & playgrounds, quality sports facilities, schools, Transport, as well as retail/cafe precincts highlight the scope of Cloverton's impressive master plan, along with easy access to Donnybrook Station & the Hume Freeway.
Contact Vijeth Shetty on 0432 407 840, before it's SOLD!
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS***

Description:
Reap the Rewards
Perfectly positioned in one of the most dynamic and exciting developments in the Northern corridor. Cloverton will soon become the new destination city of Melbourne's North and is Victoria's largest ever master-planned community which will continue to evolve and grow with you. Cloverton is already connected to the city with established Donnybrook Train Station offering direct service to Melbourne's CBD in just over 30 minutes. There's plenty of education and childcare in nearby Craigieburn and all major amenities at your fingertips via easy access to the Hume Highway.
The perfect family home for a growing family or a savvy investment choice for the astute investor This nicely presented, well designed 4 bedroom home has all the bells and whistles. Double remote garage with internal access, Master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in-robe, formal living, Master chef kitchen with a huge walk in pantry overlooking the open meals/family zone that leads to a covered alfresco. Hidden from view you will find the remaining 3 bedrooms to the rear serviced by the central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Reap the reward as values grow and enjoy all that this community has to offer as you sit back and watch your increasing capital with the continual infrastructure improvements, which are all planned out.
Inclusions list:
- 4 Bedrooms
- 2 Bathrooms
- Double Car accommodation with remote
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative Cooling
- Stone benchtops
- 900mm S/S cooktop and Dishwasher
- Walk in Pantry
- Floating floor boards
- Alfresco
For more information please contact Tim on 0428 80 70 80
